title: Utkarsh
snippet: Former footballer Mikheil Kavelashvili was elected as the new President of Georgia on 14 December, 2024.

title: Kavelashvili is inaugurated as Georgia's president, complicating its path toward EU | AP News
snippet: Demonstrators hold red cards outside of the Georgian parliament where the President-elect Mikheil Kavelashvili, a former soccer player, takes his oath at the swearing-in ceremony, in Tbilisi, Georgia, Sunday, Dec.

title: New Georgian President Sworn In Amid Political Standoff
snippet: Georgian President-elect Mikheil Kavelashvili speaks at his swearing-in ceremony at the Georgian Parliament in Tbilisi on December 29.

title: Georgia: Ex-footballer Mikheil Kavelashvili named president
snippet: Georgia's outgoing pro-Western president, Salome Zourabichvili, has condemned Kavelashvili's election as a travesty, insisting she holds Georgia's only remaining legitimate institution. ... Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze has accused Zourabichvili of trying to harm Georgia's interests, emphasising that when her term of office ends on 29 December, she will have to retire.

title: Georgia's new president is inaugurated, complicating country's path to joining EU
snippet: TBILISI, Goergia (AP) — Former soccer player Mikheil Kavelashvili was formally inaugurated as president of Georgia on Sunday, cementing the ruling party’s grip in what the opposition calls a blow to the country’s EU aspirations and a victory ...
